# ufc.stats

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains UFC fight statistics, continously updated with data from latest events. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mtoto/ufc.stats")
```
## Example usage

Who has the most significant strikes landed in UFC history?

```{r dplyr}
library(ufc.stats)
library(dplyr)

data("ufc_stats")
ufc_stats %>% group_by(Fighter) %>%
  summarise(total_strikes = sum(Significant_strikes_landed)) %>%
  arrange(-total_strikes) %>%
  head()
```

Each row represents the statistics of a fighter in a single round. Overall, the dataset consits of 36 variables:

```{r}
str(ufc_stats)
```
